version_description:
★ Fix the issue that sometimes it's difficult to login Game Center.
★ Fix the issue that you can't mute the game.
★ Fix the issue that you can't take photo under IOS6.
★ Support the Resolution of iphone5.

- Everyone who install v2.4 will get old default costume!
- New scene added!
- New costumes added!
- Auto save photo when you ride swan and click the take photo button!
- Now you can talk with us by Q&A. (Chinese or English, both ok for me

1.Support iOS11.
2.Fix the sound bug in DreamTime.
3.Add Break Rushing function, speed you up!!!
4.Fix some bugs.

1.Support iOS11.
2.Fix the sound bug in DreamTime.
3.Add Break Rushing function, speed you up!!!
4.Fix some bugs.

new in version 1.0.2
- now you can upgrade skills in SKILL SHOP.
- now costume with attributes can enhance your skills.
- 1200 extra points are provided for upgrading skills or buying new avatars.
- fix the resolution problem on the iPad.
